Command.label: Command Name
Command.tooltip: The command the bot will respond to

Permission.label: Join Permission
Permission.tooltip: Set the permission level for the command

PermissionInfo.label: Join Info
PermissionInfo.tooltip: Set the user, rank or tier for permission

Usage.label: Usage
Usage.tooltip: Usage for where the script can be used!

StartDelay.label: Start Delay (min)
StartDelay.tooltip: Number of minutes from that the command first is triggered until the fight starts

MinEntries.label: Min entries
MinEntries.tooltip: Minimum entries required to start the free for all

MaxSurvivors.label: Max Survivors
MaxSurvivors.tooltip: Max amount of users that can survive the free for all

OpenEntriesMessage.value: The arena is now open! Type $command to join!
OpenEntriesMessage.label: Open Entries Message

StartingMessage.value: The combatants have stepped in to the arena.... Who will emerge victorious?!
StartingMessage.label: Starting Message

AbortMessage.value: Not enough people were interested so the Arena has been called off.
AbortMessage.label: Abort Message

FightMessage.value: The combatants are going head to head in the arena... You can hear their weapons clashing and sparks fly in all directions... Suddenly a sand storm erupt....
FightMessage.label: Fight Messages

EndingMessage.value: The dust finally settled and only the following people emerged: $results
EndingMessage.label: Ending Messages

OffCooldown.value: The arena has been cleaned up... Want to go again?! Type $command to start!
OffCooldown.label: Off Cooldown Message

OnCooldown.value: {0} the command is still on cooldown for {1} seconds!
OnCooldown.label: On Cooldown Message
OnCooldown.tooltip:
The message that the bot will display when the command is on cooldown. 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = time remaining

NotEnoughResponse.label: Not enough currency Message
NotEnoughResponse.tooltip:
Message sent when user doesn't have enough points 
 {0} = user

PermissionResp.value: {0} -> only {1} ({2}) and higher can use this command
PermissionResp.label: Permission denied Message
PermissionResp.tooltip:
Message sent when user doesn't select any valid wire. 
{0} = user 
{1} = permission
{2} = permission info

BtnDefaults.label: Restore Default Settings
BtnDefaults.tooltip:
Reset settings back to defaults.
Reload Scripts afterwards to see the changes in the user interface!

openReadMe.label: Open README.txt
openReadMe.tooltip: Opens the README.txt for this script
